title: ICE: attempt to subtract with overflow: libsyntax_pos/lib.rs:1174:17

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
This happens when trying to compile `stdsimd` tests with a rust version with debug-assertions enabled:

```
git clone git@github.com:rust-lang-nursery/stdsimd.git
cd stdsimd/crates/coresimd
cargo test
```

